findings.details: Share page used a <dl> with <div> wrappers, which breaks definition list semantics for assistive tech.
Manual scan found no placeholder/example.com links in posts/pages. External URLs not live-checked due to offline audit.
Core SEO tags and structured data are present; share page benefits from semantic list structures.
Share page content remains concise and consistent; minor semantic refinements recommended.

recommendations: Replace definition list markup with a semantic list structure on share stats
Continue periodic link checks when network access is available
